name: jesuscarescharity-main
description: Charity website for Jesus Cares Charity.

scripts.build:css: cleancss -o dist/css/style.min.css css/linearicons.css css/font-awesome.min.css css/magnific-popup.css css/nice-select.css css/bootstrap.css css/main.css
scripts.build:js: uglifyjs -o dist/js/bundle.min.js --compress --mangle -- js/vendor/jquery-2.2.4.min.js js/vendor/bootstrap.min.js js/jquery.ajaxchimp.min.js js/jquery.nice-select.min.js js/parallax.min.js js/jquery.magnific-popup.min.js js/main.js js/donation.js js/contact.js

author: Suahco4
